db:abstract.db:para: This example shows you how to create your own custom legend.

db:article.db:para: This application shows you how to create your own custom legend instead of using the built-in legend of ChartView API.
The main view of the application shows a stacked area chart. This is how one of the stacked areas is created. See ChartViewStacked.qml and AnimatedAreaSeries.qml.

db:section.db:title: Running the Example
db:section.db:para: To run the example from Qt Creator, open the Welcome mode and select the example from Examples. For more information, visit Building and Running an Example.

db:section.db:title: Customizing Legends
db:section.db:para: Hovering with mouse on top of the legend will highlight the hovered series. (see CustomLegend.qml).
You can also select one of the stacked areas for a closer look as a line series by a mouse click (see ChartViewHighlighted.qml).
